channel.title: Help on a good pk spot
channel.description:
ok well what im doing is trying to find a good small pk area.. wich has no way out, no monsters or anything and a good spot to have a npc shouting out rules.
once i find could spot ill be making a tele command and a spawning npc that shouts rules.
so does anyone know a good spot?

item.title: Help on a good pk spot
item.dc:creator: @xunb3atabl3x xunb3atabl3x
item.description:
@xunb3atabl3x wrote:

i was going to use mage arena but it’s filled with monsters and chaos alter is a good place though im looking for somwhere that you can only tele to get out of. (saves people running) and a small place

Read full topic
item.source: Help on a good pk spot

item.title: Help on a good pk spot
item.dc:creator: @rickyjones rickyjones
item.description:
@rickyjones wrote:

hmm… heres some ideas
1:mage arena (a favourite of mine)
2:chaos alter (lvl 13 wild real rs)

thats all i got for now

Read full topic
